purpose: To simplify the development of web applications and APIs by providing a comprehensive, AI-assisted application engine.
principle: Yao leverages a declarative approach to define applications using JSON-like configuration files, enabling rapid development with minimal coding.
reusability: Offers a flexible framework with support for plugins and extensions, enabling developers to create customizable applications.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have stability issues and limited documentation. Some features might be incomplete or in development.
